en-US.summary: Learn about git and version control.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask gitlexa for information about version control
en-US.name: gitlexa
en-US.description:
Ask for Git facts, is intended to make you smarter.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Gitlexafour " or "Alexa, open Gitlexafour " to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
